reviews.text: Pro: 10 minute walk to the castle, very friendly staff
reviews.title: Great location - but shabby room

reviews.text: Con: Room very small and old fashioned, absolutely no luxury,
reviews.title: Recommended
Close to Palace, comfortable, excellent stay

reviews.text: Clean, comfortable and in a great location - with a double room for £100 a night. The hotel is in a great location 5 minutes walk from the Chateau and the train stations. The rooms are not huge, but they never are anywhere close to Paris. We avoided the 11 euro breakfast. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: A Great Hotel
